content.title: Manual Lymph Drainage
content.description: Specialized massage technique to enhance lymphatic flow in lymphedema

key_concepts.details: Light pressure, rhythmic movements following lymphatic pathways to functioning lymph nodes
Start proximal (trunk clearing) then move distally; redirect to alternative drainage pathways
Requires specialized certification; various schools (Vodder, Foldi, Casley-Smith)
Component of CDT; evidence stronger when combined with compression than alone

content.clinical_significance: Key component of complete decongestive therapy

primary_sources: Ezzo J et al. Cochrane Database Syst Rev 2015
